messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Sandra Dodd's Column No Longer in HEM
messages.msgSnippet: Wow!    That s really sad to me.  :( When I would get my HEM,  that was the first column I would turn to. She has been such a guiding force in my journey of
messages.messageBody:
Wow! That's really sad to me. :(

When I would get my HEM, that was the first column I would turn to.

She has been such a guiding force in my journey of home education. I can't tell you guys how her writings have helped me. In the beginning, when I had tons of questions, she would be on unschoolingdiscussion lists and on the message boards. It was then so cool to turn to HEM and read her column.

I was really trying to decide if I was going to renew my subscription of not. Mostly because it didn't seem very unschooly. I do remember about 6 months ago where there were 2 other articles that were about unschoolers. It was great! But, as of late the only unschooling thing in it had been Sandra's column. Now I know I probably won't.

Bummer.


I'll be checking out Life Learning Magazine and Live Free Learn Free, a new unschooling magazine.


Kelli~



"Nichole, in Round Rock, TX" <ms_fausey@...> wrote:
Why? And what is left in the magazine for unschoolers? I see basically nothing left.

__________________________________________________

messages.subject: Sandra Dodd's Column No Longer in HEM
messages.msgSnippet: Why?  And what is left in the magazine for unschoolers?  I see basically nothing left. Helen, if you re around, what will be done with the HEM unschooling.com
messages.messageBody:
Why? And what is left in the magazine for unschoolers? I see basically nothing left.
Helen, if you're around, what will be done with the HEM unschooling.com archives?



Nichole
Unschooling mama of Margaux (7)
In Round Rock, Texas, packing for Allen, TX.


"Welcome every problem as an opportunity. Each moment is the great challenge, the best thing that ever happened to you. The more difficult the problem, the greater the challenge in working it out."
~ Grace Speare
